speaker: TOBY
text: What a plague means my niece to take the death

speaker: TOBY
text: of her brother thus? I am sure care’s an enemy to

speaker: TOBY
text: life.

speaker: MARIA
text: By my troth, Sir Toby, you must come in earlier

speaker: MARIA
text: o’ nights. Your cousin, my lady, takes great exceptions

speaker: MARIA
text: to your ill hours.

speaker: TOBY
text: Why, let her except before excepted!

speaker: MARIA
text: Ay, but you must confine yourself within the

speaker: MARIA
text: modest limits of order.

speaker: TOBY
text: Confine? I’ll confine myself no finer than I am.

speaker: TOBY
text: These clothes are good enough to drink in, and so

speaker: TOBY
text: be these boots too. An they be not, let them hang

speaker: TOBY
text: themselves in their own straps!

speaker: MARIA
text: That quaffing and drinking will undo you. I

speaker: MARIA
text: heard my lady talk of it yesterday, and of a foolish

speaker: MARIA
text: knight that you brought in one night here to be her

speaker: MARIA
text: wooer.

speaker: TOBY
text: Who, Sir Andrew Aguecheek?

speaker: MARIA
text: Ay, he.

speaker: TOBY
text: He’s as tall a man as any ’s in Illyria.

speaker: MARIA
text: What’s that to th’ purpose?

speaker: TOBY
text: Why, he has three thousand ducats a year!

speaker: MARIA
text: Ay, but he’ll have but a year in all these ducats.

speaker: MARIA
text: He’s a very fool and a prodigal.

speaker: TOBY
text: Fie that you’ll say so! He plays o’ th’ viol-de-gamboys

speaker: TOBY
text: and speaks three or four languages word

speaker: TOBY
text: for word without book, and hath all the good gifts of

speaker: TOBY
text: nature.

speaker: MARIA
text: He hath indeed, almost natural, for, besides

speaker: MARIA
text: that he’s a fool, he’s a great quarreler, and, but that

speaker: MARIA
text: he hath the gift of a coward to allay the gust he hath

speaker: MARIA
text: in quarreling, ’tis thought among the prudent he

speaker: MARIA
text: would quickly have the gift of a grave.

speaker: TOBY
text: By this hand, they are scoundrels and substractors

speaker: TOBY
text: that say so of him. Who are they?

speaker: MARIA
text: They that add, moreover, he’s drunk nightly in

speaker: MARIA
text: your company.

speaker: TOBY
text: With drinking healths to my niece. I’ll drink to

speaker: TOBY
text: her as long as there is a passage in my throat and

speaker: TOBY
text: drink in Illyria. He’s a coward and a coistrel that

speaker: TOBY
text: will not drink to my niece till his brains turn o’ th’

speaker: TOBY
text: toe like a parish top. What, wench! Castiliano vulgo,

speaker: TOBY
text: for here comes Sir Andrew Agueface.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Sir Toby Belch! How now, Sir Toby Belch?

speaker: TOBY
text: Sweet Sir Andrew!

speaker: ANDREW
text: Bless you, fair shrew.

speaker: MARIA
text: And you too, sir.

speaker: TOBY
text: Accost, Sir Andrew, accost!

speaker: ANDREW
text: What’s that?

speaker: TOBY
text: My niece’s chambermaid.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Good Mistress Accost, I desire better

speaker: ANDREW
text: acquaintance.

speaker: MARIA
text: My name is Mary, sir.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Good Mistress Mary Accost—

speaker: TOBY
text: You mistake, knight. “Accost” is front her, board

speaker: TOBY
text: her, woo her, assail her.

speaker: ANDREW
text: By my troth, I would not undertake her in

speaker: ANDREW
text: this company. Is that the meaning of “accost”?

speaker: MARIA
text: Fare you well, gentlemen.

speaker: TOBY
text: An thou let part so, Sir Andrew, would thou

speaker: TOBY
text: mightst never draw sword again.

speaker: ANDREW
text: An you part so, mistress, I would I might

speaker: ANDREW
text: never draw sword again. Fair lady, do you think you

speaker: ANDREW
text: have fools in hand?

speaker: MARIA
text: Sir, I have not you by th’ hand.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Marry, but you shall have, and here’s my

speaker: ANDREW
text: hand.

speaker: MARIA
text: Now sir, thought is free. I

speaker: MARIA
text: pray you, bring your hand to th’ butt’ry bar and let

speaker: MARIA
text: it drink.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Wherefore, sweetheart? What’s your

speaker: ANDREW
text: metaphor?

speaker: MARIA
text: It’s dry, sir.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Why, I think so. I am not such an ass but I

speaker: ANDREW
text: can keep my hand dry. But what’s your jest?

speaker: MARIA
text: A dry jest, sir.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Are you full of them?

speaker: MARIA
text: Ay, sir, I have them at my fingers’ ends. Marry,

speaker: MARIA
text: now I let go your hand, I am barren.

speaker: TOBY
text: O knight, thou lack’st a cup of canary! When did

speaker: TOBY
text: I see thee so put down?

speaker: ANDREW
text: Never in your life, I think, unless you see

speaker: ANDREW
text: canary put me down. Methinks sometimes I have

speaker: ANDREW
text: no more wit than a Christian or an ordinary man

speaker: ANDREW
text: has. But I am a great eater of beef, and I believe that

speaker: ANDREW
text: does harm to my wit.

speaker: TOBY
text: No question.

speaker: ANDREW
text: An I thought that, I’d forswear it. I’ll ride

speaker: ANDREW
text: home tomorrow, Sir Toby.

speaker: TOBY
text: Pourquoi, my dear knight?

speaker: ANDREW
text: What is “pourquoi”? Do, or not do? I would I

speaker: ANDREW
text: had bestowed that time in the tongues that I have in

speaker: ANDREW
text: fencing, dancing, and bearbaiting. O, had I but

speaker: ANDREW
text: followed the arts!

speaker: TOBY
text: Then hadst thou had an excellent head of hair.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Why, would that have mended my hair?

speaker: TOBY
text: Past question, for thou seest it will not curl by

speaker: TOBY
text: nature.

speaker: ANDREW
text: But it becomes me well enough, does ’t not?

speaker: TOBY
text: Excellent! It hangs like flax on a distaff, and I

speaker: TOBY
text: hope to see a huswife take thee between her legs

speaker: TOBY
text: and spin it off.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Faith, I’ll home tomorrow, Sir Toby. Your

speaker: ANDREW
text: niece will not be seen, or if she be, it’s four to one

speaker: ANDREW
text: she’ll none of me. The Count himself here hard by

speaker: ANDREW
text: woos her.

speaker: TOBY
text: She’ll none o’ th’ Count. She’ll not match above

speaker: TOBY
text: her degree, neither in estate, years, nor wit. I have

speaker: TOBY
text: heard her swear ’t. Tut, there’s life in ’t, man.

speaker: ANDREW
text: I’ll stay a month longer. I am a fellow o’ th’

speaker: ANDREW
text: strangest mind i’ th’ world. I delight in masques

speaker: ANDREW
text: and revels sometimes altogether.

speaker: TOBY
text: Art thou good at these kickshawses, knight?

speaker: ANDREW
text: As any man in Illyria, whatsoever he be,

speaker: ANDREW
text: under the degree of my betters, and yet I will not

speaker: ANDREW
text: compare with an old man.

speaker: TOBY
text: What is thy excellence in a galliard, knight?

speaker: ANDREW
text: Faith, I can cut a caper.

speaker: TOBY
text: And I can cut the mutton to ’t.

speaker: ANDREW
text: And I think I have the back-trick simply as

speaker: ANDREW
text: strong as any man in Illyria.

speaker: TOBY
text: Wherefore are these things hid? Wherefore have

speaker: TOBY
text: these gifts a curtain before ’em? Are they like to

speaker: TOBY
text: take dust, like Mistress Mall’s picture? Why dost

speaker: TOBY
text: thou not go to church in a galliard and come home

speaker: TOBY
text: in a coranto? My very walk should be a jig. I would

speaker: TOBY
text: not so much as make water but in a sink-a-pace.

speaker: TOBY
text: What dost thou mean? Is it a world to hide virtues

speaker: TOBY
text: in? I did think, by the excellent constitution of thy

speaker: TOBY
text: leg, it was formed under the star of a galliard.

speaker: ANDREW
text: Ay, ’tis strong, and it does indifferent well in a

speaker: ANDREW
text: dun-colored stock. Shall we set about some

speaker: ANDREW
text: revels?

speaker: TOBY
text: What shall we do else? Were we not born under

speaker: TOBY
text: Taurus?

speaker: ANDREW
text: Taurus? That’s sides and heart.

speaker: TOBY
text: No, sir, it is legs and thighs. Let me see thee

speaker: TOBY
text:
caper.
                 
                Sir
                 
                Andrew
                 
                dances
                .
               Ha, higher! Ha, ha,

speaker: TOBY
text: excellent!
